tool_description: A powerful REST API to validate IBAN quickly and securely.
name: IBAN Validation
title: IBAN Validation

api_list.name: Validation Endpoint
api_list.description: Validating IBAN's is a critical step to reducing costly payment and other financially-related errors.

required_parameters.name: iban
required_parameters.description: The IBAN to validate. Note that the API will accept white spaces, so BE71 0961 2345 6769 is considered as valid as BE71096123456769.
